name: *Teleports Behind You*
description:
WASD - Move

Space - Jump (hold to jump higher)

Shift - Parkour (hold to automatically jump over obstacles)

Left click - Aim / Slash (hold to aim in slowmo, release to slash)

R - reset

The stamina bar slowly decreases while you hold the aim button.

Holding the aim button will engage slow motion as long as you have stamina.

Slashing will empty the current slot in the stamina bar.

Stamina regenerates over time, but much quicker when you are on the ground.

The longer you hold the aim button, the more "charged" your slash becomes allowing you to move farther.

The less overall stamina you have, the harder it is too aim and the longer it takes to reach a fully charged slash.
